General.Name: Beijing Jetsen Tech Co
General.Description: Beijing Jetsen Technology Co., Ltd engages in the film and television business in China. It is also involved audio and video technology services, film and television content production and distribution, as well as media copyright operations. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

3.Name: Mr. Lin  Ma
3.Title: Board Sec., Deputy GM & Non-Independent Director

4.Title: Chief Technology Officer and Deputy Gen. Mang.
